1.16.0.2:
# v0.2 changelog
+ Updated to work with LPS_Recipe_API v2.6+

1.15.0.1:
# v0.1 changelog
+ Updated for 1.16
+ resourcepack uses custom asset location
+ added timer block UI (still WIP)
+ added new Nether blocks to /setblock command
+ added command code bit items (rename these instead of paper)
 - txt code: this is a text code item. whatever this is named to will be added to the command.
 - starting code: This is the starting code always starts with /<command>
- positon code: this is used for a pos only current pos is supported ex: ~ ~1 ~
## New added commands!
+ /msg <selector> <text>
+ /tell <selector> <text>
+ /give <selector @p> <item> (!!Still being worked on!!)
